title: Budget Social Work Like Monthly Expenses: Philanthropist Nidarshana Gowani
content: Like monthly electricity bills and a monthly budget for shopping, people should also earmark funds on a regular basis for social work,Nidarshana Gowani, founder of AnkhibaiGhamandiram Gowani Trust, advised.
summary: Like monthly electricity bills and a monthly budget for shopping, people should also earmark funds on a regular basis for social work,Nidarshana Gowani, founder of AnkhibaiGhamandiram Gowani Trust, advised.

title: French Lawmaker Caught Buying Designer Drug In Street Deal
content: A French far-left lawmaker admitted on Tuesday to having been caught by police after purchasing a synthetic drug from an underage supplier in a street deal, earning him a sharp rebuke from France's law-and-order interior minister.
summary: A French far-left lawmaker admitted on Tuesday to having been caught by police after purchasing a synthetic drug from an underage supplier in a street deal, earning him a sharp rebuke from France's law-and-order interior minister.

title: Opinion: BRICS+ Wants To Reshape US-Led Economic Order. It Won't Be Easy
content: With Western sanctions faced by Russia in the wake of its war in Ukraine, Moscow is most keen to push the idea through not just to break the dollar's dominance but also to showcase to the West that it still has allies and partners on its side.
summary: With Western sanctions faced by Russia in the wake of its war in Ukraine, Moscow is most keen to push the idea through not just to break the dollar's dominance but also to showcase to the West that it still has allies and partners on its side.

title: Ukraine Not Seeking Nuclear Weapons From The West, Says President Zelensky
content: Ukraine is not requesting nuclear weapons from Western partners to defend itself against Russia, President Volodymyr Zelensky said in comments released Tuesday.
summary: Ukraine is not requesting nuclear weapons from Western partners to defend itself against Russia, President Volodymyr Zelensky said in comments released Tuesday.

title: Scientists Uncover Surprising Origins Of Humanity's Carb Cravings
content: A study shows that the AMY1 gene, responsible for starch digestion, spread long before agriculture, suggesting an evolutionary preference for carbs.
summary: A study shows that the AMY1 gene, responsible for starch digestion, spread long before agriculture, suggesting an evolutionary preference for carbs.

title: First Case Of Mpox Variant Detected In Germany
content: The first case of the new mpox variant has been detected in Germany, the Robert Koch Institute (RKI) for public health said on Tuesday, adding that it viewed the risk to the wider population as low.
summary: The first case of the new mpox variant has been detected in Germany, the Robert Koch Institute (RKI) for public health said on Tuesday, adding that it viewed the risk to the wider population as low.

title: Why AI Innovation Is Yet To Take Root In India: Expert Panel Answers
content: In a discussion titled 'AI and tech: The new frontiers of disruption' at the NDTV World Summit, saw California-based EssentialAI co-founder Niki Parmar saying she is mulling returning to India and working on AI.
summary: In a discussion titled 'AI and tech: The new frontiers of disruption' at the NDTV World Summit, saw California-based EssentialAI co-founder Niki Parmar saying she is mulling returning to India and working on AI.

title: War Knocked Human Development In Gaza Back To 1955, UNDP Says
content: The war in Gaza has devastated the Palestinian economy, which is now 35% smaller than it was at the start of Israel's invasion a year ago, while development levels in Gaza itself have collapsed to the level of the 1950s, the UN's development agency s

title: Elon Musk Hands Out Cash, Makes False Claims On Pennsylvania Tour
content: For four days billionaire Elon Musk toured Pennsylvania, putting his money and fame into helping Republican Donald Trump's campaign to take back the White House in November.
summary: For four days billionaire Elon Musk toured Pennsylvania, putting his money and fame into helping Republican Donald Trump's campaign to take back the White House in November.

title: Antony Blinken In Israel To Push For A Ceasefire In Gaza
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken was in Israel Tuesday to push for a ceasefire in Gaza after his administration called for an end to the war in Lebanon "as soon as possible".
summary: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken was in Israel Tuesday to push for a ceasefire in Gaza after his administration called for an end to the war in Lebanon "as soon as possible".

title: Quick Commerce To Be Not So Quick? Entrepreneur Sudhakar Adapa Explains
content: Sudhakar Adapa, founder and CEO of BIA Brands, explained the difference between e-commerce and quick commerce and how quick commerce will have to be 'not so quick to become sustainable.
summary: Sudhakar Adapa, founder and CEO of BIA Brands, explained the difference between e-commerce and quick commerce and how quick commerce will have to be 'not so quick to become sustainable.

title: Girl's Message In A Bottle Travels 550 Miles, Found in Sweden After A Year
content: Grace Liddle, a 12-year-old from Sunderland, was delighted to hear her message in a bottle was discovered in Sweden after traveling 550 miles across the North Sea.
summary: Grace Liddle, a 12-year-old from Sunderland, was delighted to hear her message in a bottle was discovered in Sweden after traveling 550 miles across the North Sea.

title: Glasgow Confirmed As Host City For 2026 Commonwealth Games
content: Glasgow has been confirmed as the host city for the troubled 2026 Commonwealth Games, which will be a slimmed-down version of the multi-sport event.
summary: Glasgow has been confirmed as the host city for the troubled 2026 Commonwealth Games, which will be a slimmed-down version of the multi-sport event.

title: Woman Trapped Upside Down Between Rocks While Trying To Retrieve Phone
content: NSW Ambulance paramedics, along with a multi-disciplinary rescue team, had to use a specialist winch to move heavy boulders, including one weighing 500kg, to reach her.
summary: NSW Ambulance paramedics, along with a multi-disciplinary rescue team, had to use a specialist winch to move heavy boulders, including one weighing 500kg, to reach her.

title: "Can't Walk": Girl Carries Injured Sister, Looks For Hospital In Gaza
content: Amid the war in Gaza, a heartbreaking video of a girl carrying her injured younger sister through the streets in search of medical care has surfaced. The girl, visibly exhausted, was asked where she was headed.
summary: Amid the war in Gaza, a heartbreaking video of a girl carrying her injured younger sister through the streets in search of medical care has surfaced. The girl, visibly exhausted, was asked where she was headed.

title: Human Evolution Unfolding In The High Altitudes Of Tibetan Plateau
content: A new study by Cynthia Beall of Case Western Reserve University reveals how Tibetan communities have evolved over 10,000 years to thrive in the low-oxygen environment of the Tibetan Plateau.
summary: A new study by Cynthia Beall of Case Western Reserve University reveals how Tibetan communities have evolved over 10,000 years to thrive in the low-oxygen environment of the Tibetan Plateau.

title: Ukraine's Population Has Fallen By 10 Million Since Russian Invasion: UN Report
content: Ukraine's population has declined by more than 10 million since Russia invaded in February 2022, sparking an exodus and sending birth rates plunging, the United Nations said Tuesday.
summary: Ukraine's population has declined by more than 10 million since Russia invaded in February 2022, sparking an exodus and sending birth rates plunging, the United Nations said Tuesday.

title: NDTV World Summit: Access, Ambition, Attainment - 3 As For Women Inclusivity
content: At the NDTV World Summit, the conversation on women's inclusion in India's energy, logistics, and entrepreneurial sectors took centre stage with a sharp focus on the "3As" - Access, Ambition, and Attainment - as key drivers.
summary: At the NDTV World Summit, the conversation on women's inclusion in India's energy, logistics, and entrepreneurial sectors took centre stage with a sharp focus on the "3As" - Access, Ambition, and Attainment - as key drivers.
